name: Global fish catch by end use (FishStat via SeaAroundUs)
title: Global fish catch by end use (FishStat via SeaAroundUs)
description:
This data is sourced from the Sea Around Us database published by Pauly, Zeller and Palomares, available at: http://www.seaaroundus.org/.

This project relies on multiple sources but primarily the FishStat database published by the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations. This is available here: http://www.fao.org/fishery/statistics/software/fishstatj/en.

sources.name: FishStat via Pauly, Zeller, and Palomares from Sea Around Us Concepts, Design and Data.
sources.additionalInfo:
This data is sourced from the Sea Around Us database published by Pauly, Zeller and Palomares, available at: http://www.seaaroundus.org/.

This project relies on multiple sources but primarily the FishStat database published by the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations. This is available here: http://www.fao.org/fishery/statistics/software/fishstatj/en.
sources.dataPublishedBy: Pauly D., Zeller D., Palomares M.L.D. (Editors), 2020. Sea Around Us Concepts, Design and Data (seaaroundus.org).

resources.path: Global fish catch by end use (FishStat via SeaAroundUs).csv

fields.name: fish_catch_direct_consumption
fields.description: Wild fish catch which is used for direct human consumption.

fields.name: fishmeal_and_fish_oil
fields.description: This is the quantity of wild fish catch that is used as fishmeal and fish oil for animal feed. This feed is used in land-based livestock farming (e.g. pigs, cows, chickens) and aquaculture (fish farming).

fields.name: fish_other_uses
fields.description: Wild fish catch allocated to uses beyond direct human consumption and animal feed. This can include uses of oils in industry applications, for example.

fields.name: total_fish_catch
fields.description: Total wild fish catch, measured in tonnes.
